title: A New One Parameter Unit Distribution: Median Based Unit Rayleigh (Mbur): Parametric Quantile Regression Model
content: Parametric quantile regression is illustrated for the one parameter new unit Rayleigh distribution called Median Based Unit Rayleigh distribution (MBUR) distribution. The estimation process using re-parameterized maximum likelihood function is highlighted with real dataset example. The inference and goodness of fit is also explored.
